title: Chinese
content:
Hi everyone,

I hope I’m not off topic with this one. Can anyone recommend a typeface that goes near to resembling Chinese calligraphy?

Cheers,  
Vlad

 [‹ Your views about this poster please!](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706224433/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31997 "Go to previous forum topic") [Constructive Feedback pls. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706224433/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30433 "Go to next forum topic")
author: andrei_bva

comments.content: There are quite a lot of fonts of varying qaulity, that try to resemble asian/chinese calligraphy. For example Mandarin, Chineze or Faux Chinese.. try searching after fareast, chinese decorative or asian on myfonts.com, there you will find serveral examples with varying degrees of abstraction.
